articles.author: Brittany Poulson, MDA, RDN, CD, CDCES
articles.title: Can you really get diabetes from eating too much sugar? - Lifestyle Asia Singapore
articles.description: Sugar alone doesn’t cause diabetes. However, it does have an indirect effect on insulin resistance or diabetes.
articles.content: Eating too much sugar doesn’t directly cause diabetes. However, there is a correlation (association) between being overweight or having obesity and type 2 diabetes. Over time, consuming too many food… [+13713 chars]

articles.title: 12 K-dramas with strong female characters to motivate you in 2023: The Glory, My Name, Little Women and more - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From badass fighter to resilient day-to-day hero, the land of Korean dramas has plenty of formidable female leads to spur you on as you take the new year by the horns.
articles.content: Sung Duk-mi (Park Min-young) is an art curator by day, and a K-pop idol fanatic by night. Shes capable and knows how to draw boundaries between work and play. But she finds herself in a tangle when h… [+545 chars]

articles.title: 'Generation gap': Pornsak leaves Mdada due to 'differences' with Michelle Chia and Addy Lee - AsiaOne
articles.description: We've moved from 2022 to 2023, but for livestreaming e-commerce platform Mdada, it's gone from three to two. In a surprise announcement on Instagram yesterday (Jan 2), actor-host Pornsak revealed that he has left Mdada. Pornsak is one of three famous personal…
